title: Votec VRX affordable alloy gravel bike is back with off-road updates
content:
Originally launched back in 2016, Stuttgart’s Votec bikes are back with a revamped version of their popular affordable alloy VRX gravel bike. With an all-new carbon fork, updated aluminum frame, and bigger tire clearance all around, the new VRX is a more capable gravel bike than ever, without breaking the bank… in stock now! Votec

The post Votec VRX affordable alloy gravel bike is back with off-road updates appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
